page.title: 16PUBLIC TRANSPORT IN 1985
page.content: BUSES In Twickenham we see Red London Transport buses. Many bus routes travel through our area, to and from Twickenham town centre.There are single and double decker buses. Fulwell Bus Garage is in our square. In recent years new buses have been introduced. They have toilets, washrooms, refreshments and videos on them. TRAINS In London there is a good train system Most of the trains are electric. British Rail has just introduced the APT (Advanced Passenger Train) which can go at 150 m.p.h. AEROPLANE We are quite close to Heathrow airport Britains biggest airport. Planes often fly over our school.Concorde is the noisiest. TRAFALGAR SCHOOL
